reporting-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

title.narrative: Supporting Indonesia to develop its geothermal market, to assist the development of sustainable and clean energy

description.narrative: The project is designed to assist the Indonesian Ministry of Energy develop revised geothermal policies that will stabilise and open up the geothermal market, increasing economic growth, reducing climate change emissions, and generating opportunities for international businesses, including UK ones.

participating-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
